text:
Test your model

It is time to test your model. Complete at least three tests. Then drag this tile into your workspace and answer the following questions:

Test 1

How are you testing your model? {Write your answer here}

What are your test results? {Write your answer here}

What do these results mean in the problem context? {Write your answer here}

Test 2

How are you testing your model? {Write your answer here}

What are your test results? {Write your answer here}

What do these results mean in the problem context? {Write your answer here}

Test 3

How are you testing your model? {Write your answer here}

What are your test results? {Write your answer here}

What do these results mean in the problem context? {Write your answer here}

Feel free to add more tests.

Compare your model with the initial model

Explain how your model compares with the initial model.

{Write your answer here}

Generalize your model

Explain how your model can be used to solve similar problems. Describe an example.

{Write your answer here}
